name: First Day of Ditch
description:
This a 2D Platformer game where player must find the roof of the school to ditch, but by doing that they must rely on the fresh new faces in the new school. By climbing to the top you must find directions interacting students, some might lie to you and some might tell the truth. At the end of the day you must trust your instinct. Two doorways paths are at the end. Make sure you choose the right one.

This game was made for the Bendock Game Jam #1! (This is my second Game Jam)

Hope to receive feedback and comments!
